articles.title: Kylie Jenner tells court how Blac Chyna slashed her one-time boyfriend, rapper Tyga, - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kylie Jenner, second from left, revealed in court on Monday how her ex-boyfriend, rapper Tyga once showed her a six-inch long scar he said was inflicted by Blac Chyna.
articles.content: Kylie Jenner revealed in court on Monday how her ex-boyfriend, rapper Tyga, once showed her a six-inch long scar on his arm he said was inflicted by reality star Blac Chyna when she attacked him with… [+5558 chars]

articles.title: Call My Agent was the unexpected TV smash and now the UK remake is here - Daily Mail
articles.description: JAN MOIR: Call My Agent has been so successful that a much anticipated British version called Ten Percent launches this Thursday on Amazon Prime Video, starring Jack Davenport.
